original_text: I had boasted to him about you, and you have not embarrassed me. But just as everything we said to you was true, so our boasting about you to Titus has proved to be true as well.
korean_text: 내가 그에게 너희를 위하여 자랑한 것이 있더라도 부끄럽지 아니하니 우리가 너희에게 이른 말이 다 참된 것 같이 디도 앞에서 우리가 자랑한 것도 참되게 되었도다

sentences.original_text: I had boasted to him about you,
and you have not embarrassed me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 나를 부끄럽게 하지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: But just as everything we said to you was true,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리가 너희에게 말한 모든 것이 진실이었던 것처럼,

sentences.original_text: so our boasting about you to Titus has proved to be true as well.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 디도에게 너희에 대한 자랑도 역시 참으로 증명되었다.
